work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Worked closely with other company executives to identify new business opportunities, securing contracts for enterprise government software, Software as a Service (SaaS), Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), and Managed Service solutions.
highlights: Created strategies to develop and expand existing customer base, which resulted in an $18,000,000 contract, the largest in the history of the company.

work.name: Company Name

highlights: Reduced application processing intervals from 4 weeks to 2 days.
Strengthened State agency's ability to provide fair, secure, and accurate elections.
